content: drops christmas knitted drops socks with norwegian pattern in karisma drops extra 0-1051 drops design pattern no u-751 yarn group b size 32/34 - 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 20 - 22 - 24 - 27 cm sock height approx 21 - 23 - 23 - 25 cm materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in colour no 01 off white 100 g in all sizes colour no 18 red drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm - or size needed to get 23 sts x 32 row in pattern = 10 x 10 cm worked in the round on double pointed needles top down uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=6808&cid=19
